main event: An unidentified flying object was observed on 14 August 1956, described as 12 times larger than a star, moving away at a constant speed.
interesting points: The object changed colors from white to bright yellow., The object was estimated to be at an altitude of 35,000 feet., The observation lasted for over 2 minutes., The report mentions that it was seen one week prior by five other witnesses., The object was described as swinging like a pendulum.
sighted object: a bright, large object in the sky
witness description: individuals who reported seeing the object, including one named Harvey, who was 33 years old and considered reliable
